entry.title: In Case if I Forget How to Setup Octopress in Another Machine
entry.content:
Recently I had not been in touch with my blog and forgot the whole process of using my blog in a new machine. I have learnt from this page. http://blog.zerosharp.com/clone-your-octopress-to-blog-from-two-places/ or this

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20765692/how-to-setup-octopress-if-you-already-have-one-in-github I am just writing it down in case i forgot again.
